DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine non-inferiority new Pic Insupen 34Gx3,5mm needle vs. 32Gx4mm needle term metabolic control , safety acceptability patient diabetes treated insulin .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Acceptability New Pen Needle 34gx3,5mm .
DOC.criteria: Patients type 1 type 2 diabetes Age > = 18 year Multiple daily injection insulin least 6 month Signed informed consent Pregnancy breast feed Inability fill questionnaire Combined therapy diabetes ( oral drug associate insulin injection ) Any medical condition could interfere study accord investigator 's opinion
